extensionDescription.message: Integrate user's private search results across multiple search engines

linkdingUrlHelpText.message: The URL of your Linkding instance (e.g., https://linkding.example.com)
linkdingUrlHelpText.description: Help text for Linkding URL field

linkdingApiTokenHelpText.message: Your Linkding API token. You can find this in your Linkding settings.
linkdingApiTokenHelpText.description: Help text for Linkding API token field

linkdingHighlightHelpText.message: The color used to highlight Linkding results
linkdingHighlightHelpText.description: Help text for Linkding highlight color field

linkdingRequiredError.message: Please enter your Linkding URL and API token.
linkdingRequiredError.description: Error message for missing Linkding credentials

priorityHelpText.message: Priority: Higher number means results will appear first (1-10)

sortingMethodHelpText.message: Choose how to sort results from different services based on their priorities

themeModeHelpText.message: Choose how the extension's appearance should be determined

hypothesisApiTokenHelpText.message: Your Hypothes.is API token. You can find this in your Hypothes.is developer settings.
hypothesisApiTokenHelpText.description: Help text for Hypothesis API token

hypothesisHighlightHelpText.message: Choose a color for Hypothesis search results
hypothesisHighlightHelpText.description: Help text for Hypothesis highlight color

excludeTagsHelpText.message: Annotations with these tags will be excluded from search results

mergeByUriHelpText.message: When enabled, multiple annotations from the same URL will be merged into a single result
mergeByUriHelpText.description: Help text for merge by URI

linkwardenApiTokenHelpText.description: Help text for Linkwarden API token

linkwardenHighlightHelpText.message: Choose a color for Linkwarden search results
linkwardenHighlightHelpText.description: Help text for Linkwarden highlight color

hypothesisRequiredError.message: Hypothesis username and API token are required when the service is enabled
hypothesisRequiredError.description: Error message for missing Hypothesis credentials

linkwardenRequiredError.message: Linkwarden URL and API token are required when the service is enabled
linkwardenRequiredError.description: Error message for missing Linkwarden credentials
